message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for a special price. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate it. I would like to counter with an offer of $100 for the product.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm still looking for a better deal. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $110.
I understand your position, Alice. Let me counter with an offer of $105 for the product.
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I'm still not willing to sell the product for that low of a price. I'm willing to sell it to you for $115.
I see, Alice. Let me try one last time with an offer of $110 for the product.
